DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn add a card which Channels orbs to your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust. When exited, gain 1 Focus.
Orb: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Block and Vigor. On evoke, gain 4 Block and Vigor.
